name: Second Chance (itch) (Blazingstardude)
description:
This is my first fgame, made in a week for university! A simple platformer level in which uses the concept of time to dictate how many second chances you have! Dont waste them all!

Controls-

Left Arrow Key - Move Left

Right Arrow Key - Move Right

Space - Jump

E - Attack

Good Luck! And Hope You Enjoy :)

Assets Used In This Game (And The Authors In Which You Should Check Out!)-

Flame Demon (Created by Sven)(Unused) - https://sventhole.itch.io/flame-demons-64-x64 

Fire Column (Created by Sanctumpixel) - https://sanctumpixel.itch.io/fire-column-pixel-art-effect 

Pixel Adventurer (Created By rvros) - https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero 

Skeleton Sprite Pack (Created By Jesse Muniguia) - https://jesse-m.itch.io/skeleton-pack

Pixel Fantasy Caves (Created By Szadi Art) - https://szadiart.itch.io/pixel-fantasy-caves
